name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
description: A 3-year undergraduate degree program providing in-depth knowledge of computer science, including coding, algorithms, databases, operating systems, networking, and software development. It teaches both theoretical principles and practical skills, preparing students for careers in software development, IT, cybersecurity, data analytics, and other technology-related fields. The program requires a science stream background, often with a strong foundation in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (PCM), and is available in full-time, online, and distance education modes.

careerOptions.description: Develops algorithms, applications and processes; works on project documentation, fixing bugs and software performance, maintaining operational standards.
Collects, processes and analyses large volumes of data; builds predictive models; uses statistical and machine learning techniques to help business decisions.
Oversees IT systems, ensures tech infrastructure is up-to-date and efficient; supervises technical & non-technical staff and handles system maintenance.
Designs and builds mobile applications for different platforms; tests, debugs and improves app functions and performance.
Creates user interfaces for web/mobile, uses HTML/CSS/JavaScript, ensures responsive design and user-friendly UI/UX.
Designs the overall structure of an IT system; aligns technology assets with business strategy; ensures scaling, reliability and inter-system coherence.
Ensures cybersecurity, designs and implements security protocols; protects against breaches; works on threat detection and mitigation.
Processes, examines and interprets data; generates insights; creates reports and visualizations; works with statistical tools and databases.
Works both on front-end and back-end; handles all layers of web application stack; ensures application works across systems.
Builds algorithms and systems for AI/ML; works on modeling, training, deploying machine learning systems.

higherStudyOptions.description: Postgraduate program focused on advanced topics in computer science, research or specialization.
Specialized course targeting applications of computation – software engineering, development, etc.

higherStudyOptions.courseName: M.Tech / MS / Specializations (AI, ML, Cybersecurity, Data Science)
higherStudyOptions.description: Advanced specialization or research-oriented master’s programs using rigorous algorithmic / systems focus.

topColleges.name: Acharya Narendra Dev College, New Delhi

name: Bachelor of Science in Physics
description: A 3-year undergraduate degree program focusing on the theoretical and experimental study of the fundamental laws of nature, including classical mechanics, quantum mechanics, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, and optics. The curriculum involves lectures, laboratory work, and computational techniques, preparing graduates for careers in research, academia, science, and technology.

careerOptions.description: Conducts experiments and supports research in laboratories using physics equipment and techniques.
Engages in theoretical or experimental research in areas such as quantum mechanics, astrophysics, or material science.
Applies mathematical and statistical methods to analyze data and solve scientific or industrial problems.
Works with senior researchers on projects in physics, data analysis, or applied sciences.
Teaches physics at schools, colleges, or coaching institutes.
Applies physics knowledge in industries like automobile, aeronautics, or R&D centers.

higherStudyOptions.description: A postgraduate program focusing on advanced theoretical and experimental physics.
Postgraduate engineering/technology specialization for physics graduates through GATE.
Research-oriented higher education in physics and allied sciences.

topColleges.name: National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER), Bhubaneswar
Indian Institutes of Science Education and Research (IISERs)

name: Bachelor of Science in Chemistry
description: A 3-year undergraduate degree program that provides students with both theoretical and practical knowledge of chemical sciences. The curriculum covers core areas such as organic, inorganic, and physical chemistry, along with electives.

careerOptions.description: Analyzes compounds or assists with research in labs; works in industry or academic research settings.
Tests and ensures products meet required chemical, physical, and safety specifications in industries such as pharmaceuticals, manufacturing, food & beverage.
Supports experiments, maintains and calibrates lab equipment, handles sample preparation and preliminary analysis.
Uses chemical knowledge to analyze environmental samples, assess pollution, work on sustainability and green chemistry projects.
Teaches chemistry at school or college level; may also perform academic research.

higherStudyOptions.description: Specialization in organic, inorganic, analytical or physical chemistry.
Focuses on chemical processes in biological systems.
Advanced course emphasizing chemical analysis methods and drug & pharmaceutical applications.
Research oriented doctoral degree in chemical science disciplines.

higherStudyOptions.courseName: M.Tech in Chemical Engineering (for those wanting industrial process applications)
higherStudyOptions.description: Bridges chemistry & engineering; useful for process design, industrial chemistry etc.

topColleges.name: Lady Shri Ram College for Women (LSR), New Delhi

name: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics
description: A 3-year undergraduate degree focused on numbers, structure, space, and quantity, developing analytical, logical, and problem-solving skills. The curriculum covers calculus, algebra, geometry, probability, and advanced topics like mathematical modelling and number theory. Graduates gain versatile career opportunities in data science, finance, technology, and education.

careerOptions.description: Analyzes and interprets data to generate insights for decision making.
Applies probability and statistics to assess risk for insurance and finance sectors.
Applies mathematical and statistical models for research, surveys, and government analysis.
Designs encryption and algorithms for cybersecurity and technology companies.
Builds applications and systems software leveraging mathematical logic.
Teaches mathematics at schools, colleges, or universities; may also engage in research.

higherStudyOptions.description: Core specialization in pure and applied mathematics.
For careers in finance, insurance, and analytics.
Blending mathematics with technology for advanced computing roles.
Doctoral research program in pure, applied, or interdisciplinary mathematics.
Offered at TIFR, IMSc, HRI, IISER, NISER etc.

topColleges.name: Delhi University Colleges (Hindu, St. Stephen’s, Miranda House, Hansraj, LSR)

name: Bachelor of Science in Biology
description: A 3-year undergraduate degree program focused on the study of living organisms, their structure, function, growth, evolution, and interactions with the environment. It covers core topics such as Biochemistry, Cell Biology, Molecular Biology, Genetics, Microbiology, Physiology, Botany, Zoology, Ecology, and Biotechnology. The program prepares students for careers in research, healthcare, environmental conservation, agriculture, and education, and requires a science stream background with PCM/B.

careerOptions.description: Works in laboratories conducting experiments, maintaining equipment, analyzing data, and examining specimens.
Researches cellular and molecular processes, studies genes, and contributes to medical and biotech research.
Studies human impact on ecosystems, conducts environmental tests, and advises on conservation practices.
Studies plant species, conducts research in botany, and applies horticulture and conservation techniques.
Provides advice on farming technology, land evaluation, and agricultural productivity improvements.
Studies genes, their mutations, and inheritance patterns; works in research labs and healthcare.
Manages and protects ecosystems, studies biodiversity, and works with conservation agencies.
Creates educational content for platforms, edits materials, and curates research-based resources.
Teaches biology, supervises experiments, prepares lesson plans, and mentors students in colleges or universities.

higherStudyOptions.description: Advanced studies in molecular biology, genetics, ecology, and biotechnology to pursue research or academia.
Focus on biotechnological applications in medicine, agriculture, and research.
Combines biology knowledge with management skills for leadership roles in hospitals and healthcare companies.
Specialized research programs in microbiology, botany, zoology, or ecology for academia or advanced R&D careers.
Focus on public health, epidemiology, and community healthcare management.

topColleges.name: National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER), Bhubaneswar

name: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering
description: A 4-year undergraduate professional degree that provides in-depth knowledge of computer science, programming, algorithms, software development, and computer systems engineering.

careerOptions.description: Develops, tests, and maintains software systems and applications.
Designs and implements artificial intelligence and machine learning models for solving real-world problems.
Protects systems and networks from cyber threats by identifying and addressing vulnerabilities.
Designs and manages cloud infrastructure and services for scalable applications.
Develops decentralized applications (dApps) and blockchain solutions for industries like finance, supply chain, and healthcare.
Bridges the gap between development and operations teams, ensuring continuous integration and deployment.
Manages and maintains IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and enterprise systems.
Designs user-friendly interfaces and enhances user experience in software and web applications.
Conducts advanced research in areas like algorithms, AI, or quantum computing in academia or R&D labs.
Builds technology-driven businesses and products by leveraging CS engineering knowledge.

higherStudyOptions.courseName: M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
higherStudyOptions.description: Postgraduate program focusing on advanced topics such as Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, and Software Systems.
Management-oriented postgraduate program for leadership roles in technology-driven industries.

name: Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering
description: A 4-year undergraduate engineering program focusing on electronic devices, circuits, communication systems, and related technologies.

careerOptions.description: Designs and develops electronic circuits, devices, and systems for industries like telecom and consumer electronics.
Works on the design and optimization of telecommunication systems such as mobile networks, satellites, and fiber optics.
Specializes in Very-Large-Scale Integration (VLSI) design for chips, processors, and integrated circuits.
Develops embedded hardware and software for applications like automotive electronics, IoT devices, and robotics.
Manages, designs, and maintains network infrastructure including routers, switches, and communication protocols.
Works on radio frequency systems such as antennas, radars, and wireless communication devices.
Designs and develops automated systems for manufacturing, robotics, and industrial applications.
Works with audio, video, and data signals for applications in telecom, medical imaging, and defense systems.
Develops Internet of Things solutions by integrating sensors, communication modules, and cloud platforms.
Contributes to DRDO, ISRO, and defense organizations by developing radar, satellite communication, and weapon systems.

higherStudyOptions.description: Postgraduate program focused on specialized fields like VLSI, Embedded Systems, or Communication Engineering.
Management-oriented postgraduate program suitable for leadership roles in technology-driven industries.

name: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
description: A 4-year undergraduate engineering program that focuses on computer systems, software development, networks, databases, and IT infrastructure management.

careerOptions.description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications for various domains.
Analyzes IT systems and designs efficient solutions to meet business needs.
Manages, optimizes, and secures organizational databases.
Maintains and secures computer networks including LAN, WAN, and cloud setups.
Protects IT systems, networks, and data from cyber threats.
Designs and manages scalable cloud-based IT infrastructure.
Leads IT projects by managing teams, budgets, and timelines.
Analyzes and interprets complex datasets to help organizations make decisions.

higherStudyOptions.description: Postgraduate program focusing on advanced IT concepts, networking, and data systems.
Management program that combines business strategies with IT applications.

name: Bachelor of Technology in Mechanical Engineering
description: A 4-year undergraduate engineering program focusing on design, analysis, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems, including thermodynamics, mechanics, and materials science.

careerOptions.description: Designs, develops, and tests mechanical systems, machines, and tools.
Works on vehicle design, production, and performance optimization.
Oversees manufacturing processes, ensures efficiency and quality in production lines.
Creates detailed designs and CAD models for mechanical components and systems.
Specializes in heat transfer, energy systems, and HVAC design.
Ensures machinery and equipment operate efficiently and safely.
Leads mechanical engineering projects, managing teams and resources.
Conducts research in areas like robotics, energy, and materials in labs or academia.

higherStudyOptions.description: Postgraduate program focusing on advanced areas such as robotics, thermal systems, design, and manufacturing.

higherStudyOptions.courseName: MBA in Operations or Technology Management
higherStudyOptions.description: Management-oriented program combining business strategies with technical knowledge for leadership roles in manufacturing or technology-driven industries.
